meanings.definition: The quality of being funny or amusing.
meanings.sent1: Her humorousness always lightens the mood in the office.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the humorousness of stand-up comedians.
meanings.sent3: The humorousness of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His humorousness was like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The humorousness of the clown's act was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The ability to create or appreciate humor.
meanings.sent1: His humorousness in writing jokes is impressive.
meanings.sent2: She has a great sense of humorousness.
meanings.sent3: The humorousness of his jokes always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her humorousness is a gift that brightens everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The humorousness of his wit is unmatched.
